verses.verse: A Psalm of David. Jehovah <WH3068> saith <WH5002> unto my Lord <WH113>, Sit <WH3427> thou at my right hand <WH3225>, Until I make <WH7896> thine enemies <WH341> thy footstool <WH1916>.
Jehovah <WH3068> will send <WH7971> forth the rod <WH4294> of thy strength <WH5797> out of Zion <WH6726>: Rule <WH7287> thou in the midst <WH7130> of thine enemies <WH341>.

Thy people <WH5971> offer themselves willingly <WH5071> In the day <WH3117> of thy power <WH2428>, in holy <WH6944> array <WH1926>: Out of the womb <WH7358> of the morning <WH4891> Thou hast the dew <WH2919> of thy youth <WH3208>.
Jehovah <WH3068> hath sworn <WH7650>, and will not repent <WH5162>: Thou art a priest <WH3548> for ever <WH5769> After the order <WH1700> of Melchizedek <WH4442>.
The Lord <WH136> at thy right hand <WH3225> Will strike <WH4272> through kings <WH4428> in the day <WH3117> of his wrath <WH639>.
He will judge <WH1777> among the nations <WH1471>, He will fill <WH4390> the places with dead bodies <WH1472>; He will strike <WH4272> through the head <WH7218> in many <WH7227> countries <WH776>.
He will drink <WH8354> of the brook <WH5158> in the way <WH1870>: Therefore will he lift up <WH7311> the head <WH7218>.
